section.name: Overview
section.p: The configuration component allows an application to load up arbitrary configuration data that is backed by multiple datasources.
It is backed by Commons Configuration for accessing data and implements the Configuration API.
It is written for use in any container compatible with Avalon's ECM container.

section.name: Usage
section.p: The configurationPath is the location of the file read in by the ConfigurationFactory. This then returns your Configuration object.
